results.title: ACMI moving family portraits
results.brief_description:
“Families of all shapes and sizes become part of a mammoth moving image mosaic…”
Created during an “open house” at Fed Square where photographs were taken, by Brett McLennan, of family groups and then projected live as a moving image photomontage.
In partnership with the LaTrobe University Bendigo Department of Visual Arts - Dr James McArdle, Prue Hawkey and Elysia Baker.

results.title: ACMI in the Regions: Remembering Culgoa Primary School
results.creator_credit: David Meagher, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
results.brief_description: The Culgoa Primary School closed its doors for the last time in December 2008, after over 100 years of service, due to the low student intake for the coming year. This film captures moments from a reunion organised to bring together students and teachers in celebration of times past. The town and its people are evidence of the strength and fragility of modern day living in small rural towns. The real, everyday struggles that farmers face and the heartbreaking decisions that families make, whether to stay and “tough it out” or move to a larger satellite town.

results.title: ACMI Animation Open Studios: three weekends in September and October 2007
results.creator_credit: Jason White and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: Three animators - Dave Jones, Nick Hilligoss, Steve Piscopo - participated in three weekends over September and October 2007 in the ACMI Animation Open Studios (as part of Pixar) sharing their secrets with people of all ages. Using a combination of moving image, stills and animation to a music soundtrack, this is a record of what took place.

results.title: Aclà
results.creator_credit: Aurelio Grimaldi, Camilla Nesbitt, Pietro Valsecchi, Pentafilm, Nova Films and CineEuropa '92
results.brief_description: In the 1930s and 11-year-old Sicilian boy, Acla, is sold to a sulphur miner, and for five years from Monday to Saturday, the boy is made the miner’s property, spending the whole week down the mine, going home on Saturday and Sunday. There he experiences the inhuman world of the sulphur mines, the stifling, choking tunnels and the physical and sexual violence that everybody indulges in by unspoked agreement. He attempts several escapes, but each time he is caught and beaten. Until the last attempt, when finally he reaches the sea. And freedom… In Italian language with English subtitles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Aurelio Grimaldi, Camilla Nesbitt, Pietro Valsecchi, Pentafilm, Nova Films and CineEuropa ‘92

results.title: Acid from heaven
results.creator_credit: George Mully and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Many years ago there was a popular song suggesting that each time it rained it rained pennies from heaven. Today’s reality is that when it rains, it rains acid from heaven. By re-enacting a case study of a person whose income was cut off as a direct result of acid rain, this presentation, composed of still photo montage, provides in laymen’s terms some basic information about this little-known form of pollution.

results.title: Ace Ventura: when nature calls (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Steve Oedekerk, James G. Robinson and Morgan Creek
results.brief_description: Jim Carrey again stars as Ace Ventura, the animal sleuth with the gravity-defying hairstyle in this sequel to ‘Ace Ventura, Pet Detective’ (309280). In the deepest jungles of Africa, two tribes will fight a savage war unless their sacred animal god is found. So they’re sending for the only man who can help. Africa will never be the same again as Ace discovers the animal within and answers the call of the wild in this out-there comedy! Cast includes Jim Carrey, Ian McNeice, Simon Callow, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje and Maynard Eziashi.

results.title: Ace Ventura: pet detective
results.creator_credit: Tom Shadyac, James G. Robinson and Morgan Creek
results.brief_description: There’s hope out there for all distraught pet owners concerned about the disappearance of their pets; Ace Ventura, pet detective, whose leading the small but exclusive field. Ace is contacted by the beautiful Melissa (Courteney Cox), to locate Snowflake, dolphin mascot of the Miami Football team and good luck charm. Ace is not only up against a ruthless kidnapper, but scorn and resistance from the police force who have the utmost contempt for his profession. Cast includes Jim Carrey, Sean Young, Courteney Cox, Tone Loc and Dan Marino (Miami Dolphins).

results.title: According to the evidence
results.brief_description: Scenes in a committal hearing and in court with a jury are created and structured to present, for the benefit of law students, the problems, laws and precedents regarding the nature and admissibility of evidence
